scenario_text.value:
I’ve learned a great deal since last I saw
this mural, and so have made new discoveries.

First, this is the oldest of the murals. The
one closest to the truth of this world.

I’ve tried to account for that in my
observations, but sadly it’s not helped much.

Something happened, and humans and monsters
were split apart. This was a great tragedy.
Wait. When you way “split apart,” you mean...

That’s right. I believe that originally, the
two worlds were one.

So...this world and our world were one and
the same?

I do not know why they were split, or what
life was like when they were one.

But I would like to think that those answers
lie ahead of us.

If there’s another level below, as Renamon
says, the murals there may tell us more.
